scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-static-files && npm run build-types && npm run build-lib && npm run build-background && npm run build-content && npm run build-options
scripts.copy-static-files: mkdir -pv dist/content && cp -rv src/content/*.html src/content/*.js dist/content/ && mkdir -pv dist/content/styles && cp -rv src/content/styles/* dist/content/styles/ && mkdir -pv dist/options && cp -rv src/options/*.html dist/options/ && mkdir -pv dist/options/styles && cp -rv src/options/styles/*.css dist/options/styles/
